verses.name: Genesis 29:20
verses.text: And Jacob served seven years for Rachel; and they seemed unto him but a few days, for the love he had to her.

verses.name: Genesis 29:21
verses.text: And Jacob said unto Laban, Give me my wife, for my days are fulfilled, that I may go in unto her.

verses.name: Genesis 29:22
verses.text: And Laban gathered together all the men of the place, and made a feast.

verses.name: Genesis 29:23
verses.text: And it came to pass in the evening, that he took Leah his daughter, and brought her to him; and he went in unto her.

verses.name: Genesis 29:24
verses.text: And Laban gave unto his daughter Leah Zilpah his maid for an handmaid.
